item.title:
‘THE LITTLE MERMAID’ starring Halle Bailey is on-track for a $110M 4-day opening at the domestic box office, which would make it one of the biggest Memorial Day opening weekends of all-time.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/box-office-little-mermaid-opening-projection-1235356151/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Victoria Justice, Devon Ross, Taylor John Smith and Dermot Mulroney to star in ‘Sic.’
The film follows a group of roommates who accidentally kill an innocent man, leading them down a dangerous path of deception and cover-up.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/victoria-justice-devon-ross-taylor-smith-dermot-mulroney-new-movie-1235356135/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Elisabeth Moss, Kate Hudson and Kaia Gerber to star in psychological thriller ‘Shell’ from Max Minghella.
Actress Samantha (Moss) is given an opportunity to get a free trial at a beauty company which promises to keep its clients looking young forever.
(https://deadline.com/2023/05/elisabeth-moss-kate-hudson-kaia-gerber-max-minghella-shell-cannes-market-1235355961/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates
FilmUpdates

item.title:
First poster for ‘THE IDOL’ has been released.
Premieres June 4 on Max.
